::Zardus/DevilDuer/Reptilica::

Zardus nods, frowning.

"I'll set the scanners on Megatron," he says, standing up, "You may use the 
CR chambers, but don't try anything, the defences are watching you."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer sees CyberShark in the distance, speeding up his run. He activates 
his comm-link.

"Hey, you," he says into it, the tranmission heading out to CyberShark, "What 
are you doing in Alliance territory?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica's shuttle reaches North America, heading toward the new craft.
